## JwtMessageHandler class

A plugin for [MessageHandler](./daf-message-handler.messagehandler.md) that finds and verifies a JWT in a message

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JwtMessageHandler extends AbstractMessageHandler 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [AbstractMessageHandler](./daf-message-handler.abstractmessagehandler.md)
